ssc
Class SSCPosition

java.lang.Object
  ssc.SSCPosition

public class SSCPosition
extends java.lang.Object

Represent a position in SSC. Position system used is latitude and longitude in degrees using decimal notation. Altitude is not used in SSC and thus not part of a position. Snow movement is measured in SSC and thus distance and direction is of interest. There might be a need for transformation of this position to another position system. For display on a map to take an example. None of this is implemented.

Author:
Jim Gunnarsson, di98jgu
